system.description: For companies that want to publish web content or individuals that want to blog, Komplete Lite is an Open Source CMS (Content Management System) that allows intuitive content publishing. Unlike other free CMS solutions, that are designed for technical aware persons, Komplete Lite is built from scratch to allow visual content editing with no HTML knowledge required. Komplete Lite features: Easy site structure editing; Multiple layout support; Integrated WYSIWYG editor; Easy nugget administration; RSS generator/importer; MySQL support; Based on the Krysalis platform; Supports multiple operating systems.
